original_title: Maradona - A Vida de um Gênio no Futebol
overview: Diego Armando Maradona, for the Argentines, is on the same level of myths as Carlos Gardel, Che Guevara and Evita Perón. In this documentary, you will follow all the genius of one of the greatest soccer players of all time
title: Maradona - A Vida de um Gênio no Futebol
